author: CrystalRae
text:
‘Hey friends don’t forget to drink water’  - - I say to my cats because I can’t stand when they puke 🤢 
But also a reminder to all you lovelies 💜

author: CrystalRae
text:
“Following my curves
you declared my body your home
And in your fingertips I found a house
But slowly home became the curves that you no longer touched,
the curves I no longer loved
And now I am a woman without a home - searching for you, searching for me” -Shahnaj S. https://t.co/8wHSe7rB96

author: CrystalRae
text: What once was just for you https://t.co/T2I95lhGqp

author: CrystalRae
text: Good morning to anyone who doesn’t get a ‘good morning’ text every day 💛 Have a spectacular day!! https://t.co/38KDNcgszc
